strName.description: The code name of the settings, as referred to.

fTensionPeriod.description: Time in seconds between different tension events being spawned (bad)

fReleasePeriod.description: Time in seconds between different release events being spawned (good).

fSocialPeriod.description: Time in seconds after socialising before characters will socialise with the player again.

dictEventChances.description:
Chances for specific plot events to occur
Allchances must add up to 1.0

bonus_derelict.description: Chance the game spawns a better quality(less damaged) derelict the next time the player docks to a new derelict.

mariner.description: Chance the game spawns a mariner near the player

micrometeoroid.description: Chance the game hits the player with a micrometeoroid

police_patrol.description: Chance the police are spawned and lock onto the player

part_failure.description: Chance one of the damaged parts spontaneously fails

emotional_clobber.description: Chance the player is clobbered by their own emotions
